sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtncmmntyuser ( cmmnty_id , emplyr_id , mngr_at , sbscrb_de , secsn_de , use_at , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id ) VALUES ( #cmmntyId# , #emplyrId# , #mngrAt# , #sbscrbDe# , #secsnDe# , #useAt# , SYSDATE() , #frstRegisterId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtncmmntyuser SET cmmnty_id = #cmmntyId# , emplyr_id = #emplyrId# , mngr_at = #mngrAt# , sbscrb_de = #sbscrbDe# , secsn_de = #secsnDe# , use_at = #useAt# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND cmmnty_id = #cmmntyId# AND emplyr_id = #emplyrId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtncmmntyuser WHERE 1 = 1 AND cmmnty_id = #cmmntyId# AND emplyr_id = #emplyrId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT cmmnty_id , emplyr_id , mngr_at , sbscrb_de , secsn_de , use_at , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id FROM comtncmmntyuser WHERE cmmnty_id = #cmmntyId# AND emplyr_id = #emplyrId#

SELECT cmmnty_id , emplyr_id , mngr_at , sbscrb_de , secsn_de , use_at , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id FROM comtncmmntyuser WHERE 1=1
cmmnty_id = #searchKeyword#
emplyr_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY cmmnty_id DESC , emplyr_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtncmmntyuser WHERE 1=1
cmmnty_id = #searchKeyword#
emplyr_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
